Articles.Content:
EDIT: Ninja'd

Saying you don't deserve to be a cheater then you are obviously a CHEATER!!
LAWL CHEATER!. Lawl you are seeing this? CHEATER

Bashing the keyboard with your forehead? Cheaterpants. Everyone knows the proper way to type without hands is using your nose.

Edit: Multiple ninjas? Cheaters, the lot of you. Honorable posters ninja one at a time.
All of you getting ninja'd? Cheaters! Everyone knows you have to be able to defend against ninjas to not be a cheater!
You demand peoples' reputation?!?! CHEATER!!

Ok first of all, i didn't demand it. I simply reminded them that it is there, and that they are free to use it if they wish.

And secondly, it's not their rep anyways. its just rep that they have disposal of.

Anyways, back on topic! A part of two companies at once? Cheater! Real players only commit to one company!
You judge people by their demands? Cheater. Real players know better to judge a person by how many times they have won KSP.
Sir i do believe i ninja'd you...WHICH MAKES YOU A CHEATER! I just said this morning that non-cheaters know how to defend against ninjas!
You are able to ninja someone? The only way to have such a high ninja-skill at less than 500 posts is to cheat.

Blaming the victim? Hallmark of cheaters everywhere. Everyone knows you blame the perpetrator.

Edit: Thread full of ninjas? The forum is cheating. Real forums are ninja free.
You were ninja'd?? That's cheats.
Blaming the System? Cheater. Real players turn it upside down instead
TURNING THE SYSTEM UPSIDE DOWN? where is Dr. Haaax when you need him?

Relying on Dr. Haaax* to fix your problems? Why not have him run your life for you, cheater. Real players are their own doctors.

*Don't let Dr. Haaax touch you, he's not a real doctor.
You cheated to get that medical degree!
Worried about the doctor's degree-getting cheating process? Cheater. Real pacients have their own fever degree control so as to make the other one obsolete.
You are reading this AGAIN? Cheater!
Using almost eye bleeding yellow text? Cheater! Real players only use the actual eye bleeding yellow text!
Colored fonts? That's for cheaters with modern browsers. Real Internet denizens use Lynx and render everything in monospace fonts, the way it's supposed to be.
Uh, trying to tell us how it's supposed to be? Cheats everywhere! Real players know that its never supposed to be the same for everyone!
Different user experiences? That's for cheaters who think they're a unique snowflake. Real players play the same game as everyone else so they know they've won fair and square.
Breaking the first rule? Cheater. Real fighters follow the rules to the letter.
Not being online?! You are a cheater. Real players of this game are always online.
Being a "Dat Red Dragon"? CHEATER!
Calling me a cheater in invisible text? Embarrassment signifies cheating!
